sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Box :widget="widget" v-if="widget && show" />
</template>
<script>
import { mapMutations, mapState } from 'vuex'
import useIframeControl from '../../hooks/iframe'
import Box from './Box'
import WidgetUseCase from '../../arch/widget/usecase'
const widgetUseCase = new WidgetUseCase()

export default {
  components: {
    Box,
  },
  props: {
    config: Object,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      widget: null,
      recurrence: false
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState({
      customer: state => state.survey.customer,
      token: state => state.survey.token,
      show: state => state.survey.show,
    }),
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapMutations({
      setToken: 'survey/setToken',
      setCustomer: 'survey/setCustomer',
      showWidget: 'survey/showWidget',
      setEditMode: 'survey/setEditMode',
    }),
    async getCustomerRecurrence(){
      const response = await widgetUseCase.checkCustomerRecurrence(this.token, this.customer)
      this.recurrence = response.quarantine
    },
    async getWidget() {
      if (this.recurrence){
        console.log('[Widget] customer in recurrence rule')
        return
      }
      const response = await widgetUseCase.getOne(this.token)
      this.widget = response

      if (!this.widget) {
        return
      }

      //Remove non question items
      this.widget = widgetUseCase.removeNonQuestionItems(this.widget)
    },
    getIframeData() {
      const iframe = useIframeControl()
      iframe.updateDataListener()
      iframe.getTokenKey()
    },
    getConfigData() {
      if (this.config) {
        this.setToken(this.config.key)
        this.setCustomer(this.config.customer)
        this.setEditMode(this.config.edit)
      }
    },
    showWidgetByUser() {
      return widgetUseCase.canShow(this.widget)
    },
    async setup() {
      this.getIframeData() //Get data in iframe
      this.getConfigData() //Get data in class config
      if (this.customer){//Check if customer is in recurrence rule
        await this.getCustomerRecurrence()
      }
      await this.getWidget()
      if (!this.widget) {
        return
      }
      const show = this.showWidgetByUser(this.widget)
      if (!show) {
        return
      }

      const delay = this.widget.delay || 0
      const vm = this
      setTimeout(() => {
        // startTime = new Date().getTime()
        vm.showWidget(show)
      }, delay * 1000)

      widgetUseCase.setShowAt()
      widgetUseCase.postOpenCounter()
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.setup()
  },
}
</script>
